summary: The diff implements most of REQ-6, REQ-7, and REQ-8. Core components (PlantGarden, Plant, Branch, plantGrouping utils) are present with correct stage logic, tooltips, reactive updates, horizontal scroll layout, view toggle, and animations. A minor gap exists: seed-stage plants do not render leaf/branch representations of their single entry.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each gratitude entry for a subject is visually represented as a branch or leaf on its corresponding plant.
missing_requirements.reason: In Plant.tsx, branches/leaves are only rendered when stage !== 'seed'. A plant at the seed stage (1 entry) has no visual leaf/branch representation of that entry, violating the AC that every gratitude entry must be visually represented as a branch or leaf.

hallucinated_features.description: HeroBanner component rendering a gratitude-hero image (gratitude-hero.dim_1200x400.png) above the stats and form
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a hero banner image or a HeroBanner component. This was added to App.tsx without being requested in any requirement.
